alert.note: Alert for Canon City Vicinity, Eastern Fremont County; Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Northern El Paso County, Monument Ridge, Rampart Range Below 7500 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 20 at 12:14AM MST until January 20 at 5:00AM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 AM MST EARLY THIS MORNING... * WHAT...A mix of freezing drizzle and light snow is expected to continue through the overnight hours. A light glaze of ice is likely, especially on elevated surfaces. Additional snow accumulations will remain very light with most areas seeing a trace or less. Dense freezing fog is also expected, which will provide additional slick conditions. * WHERE...El Paso and Fremont Counties. * WHEN...Until 5 AM MST early this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
